thread.title: SecurCapital CEO joins Board of Directors of Deliver-EZ

author: cnbc.com
title: SecurCapital CEO joins Board of Directors of Deliver-EZ
text:
LOS ANGELES, March 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --
via OTC PR WIRE-- Global Payout, Inc. (OTC Pink:GOHE) supply chain finance subsidiary, SecurCapital Corp today announced the appointment of its CEO to the Deliver-EZ Board of Directors a ground breaking final mile solutions company offering neighborhood robotically operated package delivery hubs open 7 by 24.
"Stephen Russell of SecurCapital Corp is joining the Deliver-EZ Board of Directors," said Dave Kilzer, Deliver-EZ Co-Founder, " Steve brings tremendous executive knowledge, logistics expertise and energy to Deliver-EZ as we partner with SecurCapital ." "Deliver-EZ continues to add the right business leaders to our Board to ensure short and long-term success of our organization, we are very fortunate Steve has agreed to help steer Deliver-EZ for the betterment of our customers and shareholders as we penetrate the home delivery marketplace," added Craig Foster, Co-Founder and CEO.
"Deliver-EZ is a final mile game changer about to disrupt home delivery," Russell said. "All of us at SecurCapital are pleased to add our logistics expertise and supply chain finance solutions as an investor and board member with the dynamic Deliver-EZ founding team." He added, "With the complexities and challenges faced in final mile delivery security and cost ordering your goods via Deliver-EZ provides the logistics industry with a break-through technology for automating goods and assuring products being securely delivered."
Deliver-EZ ground breaking products and services create top quality alternative final mile (last mile) delivery solution more robust than present alternatives currently offered. Deliver-EZ is best described as neighborhood robotically operated package handling hubs that are open 7 by 24. Deliver-EZ offers a technology platform and app that gives on-line shoppers timely information and multiple on-demand nontraditional delivery options in a safe, secure environment to suit their busy lifestyle. Deliver-EZ services are offered through mega on-line retailers and transportation providers to on-line shoppers.
About Global Payout, Inc. (OTC Pink:GOHE)
Since the Company's inception in 2009, Global Payout, Inc. has been a leading provider of comprehensive and customized prepaid payment solutions for domestic and international organizations distributing money worldwide. In 2014, Global introduced its first online payment platform called the Consolidated Payment Gateway (CPG), which allowed its enterprise clients to transfer money to international bank accounts, mobile accounts, and prepaid card accounts. The development of the CPG became the foundation for the introduction of its new, state of the art FINTECH payment system in 2017, for both online and mobile applications to allow account holders to maximize an expanded suite of financial services and minimize operational costs. Global will continue to offer their FINTECH payment system to many vertical markets for support of foreign currency exchange and digital currency, including ongoing support of the banking industry and international governments.
About SecurCapital Corp
SecurCapital is a Fintech supply chain finance company offering premier payment and working capital solutions for the logistics industry. The SecurCloud Platform ('SCP') provides an integrated system for global payments, foreign exchange, and accounts receivable financing services through a proprietary ecosystem controlled by the client. The dashboard user environment allows the client to optimize cash flow management through document delivery of invoices, proof of delivery, and payment transactions to global vendors.
